knimeNode.name: Microbial Data Editor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Add, change or delete assay conditions, time and microbial concentration

fullDescription.intro: Add, change or delete assay conditions, time and microbial concentration.
fullDescription.option: Choose a data set from the drop down menu. If the data source is a spreadsheet the ID will have a long negative number. If data are imported from a database the database ID will be displayed.
Delete the whole data set currently being displayed.
It is possible to edit time and concentration as well as to add or delete entries. To delete a row click the '-' button next to the row. To add a row in front click the '+' button.
The node discards all changes and displays again the input data.

ports.inPort: Microbial data from spreadsheets (via ComBase Reader or XLS Microbial Data Reader) or from a database (via Microbial Data Reader)
